variants.Description in input context: L166P mutant DJ-1 expression vector, thymin was changed to cytosine at position 497 from ORF start in of pEGFP-DJ-1 using the QuickChange site-directed mutagenesis system

A homozygous 14 kb large deletion removing exons 1-5, and a compound heterozygous mutation leading to the frameshift in the exon 1 and the splice error in exon 7, both are predicted to result in a loss of functional protein
